name: Ursarctic Drytron
text: Banish both 1 "Ursarctic Big Dipper" and 1 "Drytron Fafnir" from your hand and/or field (even if face-down), then Special Summon 1 "Ursatron, the Celestial Polar Illuminaship" from your Extra Deck. If "Ursarctic Polari" or "Drytron Alpha Thuban" is on the field, you can banish 1 of the above cards from your Deck instead. If you would Tribute a monster(s) to activate an "Ursarctic" or "Drytron" monster's effect, you can banish this card from your GY instead. You can only use this effect of "Ursarctic Drytron" once per turn.
